name: Chocolate Bliss Brownies with Chocolate Fudge Sauce
preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup, whisk sauce mix with whipping cream. Bring to a boil.
Using a hand mixer, beat sauce to desired thickness.
Lightly oil a Round Cake Pan.
In a large bowl, whisk eggs with melted butter. Stir in brownie mix then spread batter into pan.
Bake for 15–20 min. Cool in pan before icing.
Spread chilled icing and top with whole food sprinkles, cut and enjoy
tips: To make mini Yule logs, simply bake recipe in Perfect Petites mold, ice with Chocolate Fudge Sauce, and decorate festively!

products.name: Chocolate Bliss Brownie Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Decadent, rich chocolate flavour & smooth fudgy texture. Made with wholesome organic cocoa powder, organic cane sugar, and chickpea flour.

products.name: Multipurpose Pot - 8 Cup
summary: An 8 cup, multi-use, stainless-steel cooking pot with a lid made of glass, steel & silicone rubber.
